title: Create OpenRouter helper for model fetching
acceptance_criteria: getOpenRouterModels(apiKey?) fetches models from OpenRouter API and caches for 1 hour
validateModel(modelId, apiKey?) returns boolean checking if model exists
getImageModels(apiKey?) filters models to those with image capability
Uses bot's API key from config as fallback if no apiKey provided
Handles API errors gracefully with proper error messages
